Package dateTimeUtil

Class DateTimeConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • dateTimeUtil.DateTimeConverter
  • public class DateTimeConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class converts different timezones or data time related logics.

        public static java.sql.Timestamp convertAptTimeToEST​(java.time.LocalDate dateValue,
                                                     java.lang.String hrValue,
                                                     java.lang.String minuteValue)
        This method converts user wished appointment time to EST time
        Parameters:
        dateValue - the date entered by the user
        hrValue - the hour entered by the user
        minuteValue - the minute entered by the user
        Returns:
        an EST time

      • isWithin15mins

        public static boolean isWithin15mins​(java.sql.Timestamp timestamp)
        This method find times that is 15 minutes far away from current local time to a booked appointment time. Give 16 minutes check point instead of 15 minutes to avoid a difference in just few seconds between 15 and 16 minutes
        Parameters:
        timestamp - a booked time
        Returns:
        true if it is within 15 minutes, otherwise returns false.

      • isWithinOfficeHour

        public static boolean isWithinOfficeHour​(java.time.LocalDate dateValue,
                                         java.lang.String hrValue,
                                         java.lang.String minuteValue,
                                         java.time.LocalDate endDate,
                                         java.lang.String endH,
                                         java.lang.String endM)
        This method checks whether user wished booking time is within office hour( 8am -22pm, Monday - Friday)
        Parameters:
        dateValue - a appointment start hour
        hrValue - an appointment start hour
        minuteValue - an appointment start minute
        endDate - an appointment end date
        endH - an appointment end hour
        endM - an appointment end minute
        Returns:
        true if iswithin office hour, otherwise return false.

      • isWeekend

        private static boolean isWeekend​(java.time.LocalDateTime aptStartDateTime,
                                 java.time.LocalDateTime endDateTime)
        This method checks whether the appointment is during a weekend day.
        Parameters:
        aptStartDateTime - an appointment start time
        endDateTime - an appointment end time
        Returns:
        true if it is in the weekend, otherwise false.

      • checkOfficeDateTime

        private static boolean checkOfficeDateTime​(java.time.LocalDateTime aptDateTime,
                                           java.time.LocalDateTime officeOpenDateTime,
                                           java.time.LocalDateTime officeCloseDateTime,
                                           java.time.LocalDateTime endDateTime)
        This method checks whether user appointment is within EST office hour.
        Parameters:
        aptDateTime - the appointment start time
        officeOpenDateTime - the time when office opens
        officeCloseDateTime - the time when office closes
        endDateTime - the appointment end time
        Returns:
        true if the appointment is within EST office hour, false when out of office hour.
